caption: Relating to the applicability of sex offender registration requirements to the offense of improper relationship between educator and student.
summary: This bill amends the Criminal Code to include "improper relationship between educator and student" as a reportable conviction requiring sex offender registration. The bill applies to all offenders regardless of nationality, including Chinese immigrants. Any educator convicted of this offense must register as a sex offender, which impacts employment, housing, and travel restrictions.
translation: 该法案修改刑法，将"教育工作者与学生之间的不当关系"列入需要进行性犯罪者登记的应报告定罪之一。该法案适用于所有犯罪者，包括中国移民。任何因此罪名被定罪的教育工作者都必须登记为性犯罪者，这将影响其就业、住房和出行限制。
committees:
1. House Committee on Criminal Justice
2. House Committee on Public Education
3. House Committee on Judiciary Civil Jurisprudence
